alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 11:41PM MDT until March 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of two to three inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Marshall and Roberts Counties. In Minnesota, Traverse County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
